```{R}
runs_dir_path <- "../../results/experiments/"
run_name <- "2021-08-20_lstm_eng_5e_256b_em100_hd100_v5000_run"
train_surprisals_name <- "train_average_surprisals.csv"
val_surprisals_name <- "validation_average_surprisals.csv"
num_runs <- 5
auto_generate_run_names = TRUE
```


```{R}
train_surprisal_dfs <- list()
val_surprisal_dfs <- list()
runs_list <- list()
if (auto_generate_run_names) {
  for (i in 0:(num_runs - 1)) {
    runs_list[i + 1] <- paste(run_name, toString(i), sep="")
    train_surprisals_dfs[i + 1] <- read.csv(paste(runs_list[i + 1], train_surprisals_name))
    val_surprisals_dfs[i + 1] <- read.csv(paste(runs_list[i + 1], val_surprisals_name))
    
  }
}

```

all_val_surprisals <- list()
